
// Ideally we'd use unpackUnorm4x8(), but this is not available
vec4 unpackVec4(uint inp)
{
	float R = float (inp >> 24) / 256.0;
	inp &= uint(0x00FFFFFF);
	float G = float (inp >> 16) / 256.0;
	inp &= uint(0x0000FFFF);
	float B = float (inp >> 8) / 256.0;
	inp &= uint(0x000000FF);
	float A = float (inp) / 256.0;
	return vec4 (R,G,B,A);
}

#define IMG0_WIDTH 52
#define IMG0_HEIGHT 16
uint shaderBuf0[208] = uint[](0u,10367u,2085159007u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,25867u,0u,0u,0u,13232638u,4277844734u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,12u,2387965696u,0u,0u,0u,3687778088u,7012094u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,1157513216u,0u,0u,163u,3657466365u,1953334782u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,872300800u,0u,0u,183u,387136689u,2466289150u,114u,98u,0u,1343619072u,6488064u,106u,2080374784u,889078016u,4757642u,973079906u,31u,3170914427u,38654u,34302u,7329278u,1560281139u,4263575640u,3573443699u,505270622u,4274341376u,889077760u,889087486u,4089626665u,0u,117342720u,37630u,6356734u,3899265534u,4264955641u,4276612741u,49413731u,15334962u,301923865u,805190418u,4268425221u,146745088u,0u,888747335u,1228584446u,48630u,254u,2298478669u,4263051264u,16230912u,3014185u,1138313472u,889076746u,4153671728u,2877095936u,69u,2643106460u,2610158078u,49147u,766u,2365587535u,4263510016u,16101376u,3276456u,2248146944u,872300800u,352162558u,3556211456u,14736u,0u,36350u,48890u,766u,2332033103u,4263378944u,2097065216u,3276424u,0u,855522816u,1113663u,354745963u,13167075u,4010216212u,2805661438u,72875764u,1022u,2358585838u,4264821353u,4177438464u,65207851u,547356675u,3757986304u,10962176u,65174u,3255435264u,2801729255u,251685374u,2717945086u,216u,4264624185u,4274847333u,16500742u,2489975u,3305111552u,620685324u,1993277182u,2849421824u,1485921280u,9474329u,105u,120u,19u,1275068416u,1065183488u,8388213u,13990u,385875968u,4201999u,1677752204u,2509373440u,5717760u,0u,197376u,262656u,0u,0u,1751777280u,9654813u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,197376u,0u,84u,4275564272u,3828088832u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,6278u,49349u,805306368u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u);

float image0Blit(in vec2 uv)
{
	uv = uv * vec2 (5.100, 8.500) - vec2 (2.050, 4.600);

	if (uv.x < 0.0 || uv.x > 1.0) return 0.0;
	if (uv.y < 0.0 || uv.y > 1.0) return 0.0;

	int vi = int ((1.0 - uv.y) * float (IMG0_HEIGHT));
	int ui = int (uv.x * float (IMG0_WIDTH));
	uint fetchedSample = shaderBuf0[vi*(IMG0_WIDTH/4) + (ui/4)];
	vec4 unpackedColor = unpackVec4 (fetchedSample);
	if (ui % 4 == 0) return unpackedColor.x;
	else if (ui % 4 == 1) return unpackedColor.y;
	else if (ui % 4 == 2) return unpackedColor.z;
	else return unpackedColor.a;
}

#define IMG1_HEIGHT 17

float image1Blit(in vec2 uv)
{
	uv = uv * vec2 (4.500, 15.500) - vec2 (1.710, 4.300);

	if (uv.x < 0.0 || uv.x > 1.0) return 0.0;
	if (uv.y < 0.0 || uv.y > 1.0) return 0.0;

	int vi = int ((1.0 - uv.y) * float (IMG1_HEIGHT));
	int ui = int (uv.x * float (IMG1_WIDTH));
	uint fetchedSample = shaderBuf1[vi*(IMG1_WIDTH/4) + (ui/4)];
	vec4 unpackedColor = unpackVec4 (fetchedSample);
	if (ui % 4 == 0) return unpackedColor.x;
	else if (ui % 4 == 1) return unpackedColor.y;
	else if (ui % 4 == 2) return unpackedColor.z;
	else return unpackedColor.a;
}

float image2Blit(in vec2 uv)
{
	uv = uv * vec2 (5.000, 5.000) - vec2 (1.957, 1.750);

	if (uv.x < 0.0 || uv.x > 1.0) return 0.0;
	if (uv.y < 0.0 || uv.y > 1.0) return 0.0;

	int vi = int ((1.0 - uv.y) * float (IMG2_HEIGHT));
	int ui = int (uv.x * float (IMG2_WIDTH));
	uint fetchedSample = shaderBuf2[vi*(IMG2_WIDTH/4) + (ui/4)];
	vec4 unpackedColor = unpackVec4 (fetchedSample);
	if (ui % 4 == 0) return unpackedColor.x;
	else if (ui % 4 == 1) return unpackedColor.y;
	else if (ui % 4 == 2) return unpackedColor.z;
	else return unpackedColor.a;
}

#define IMG3_HEIGHT 57

566373u,419430400u,0u,999494u,792418128u,1636861833u,2357221452u,909193523u,1347768916u,2089502513u,184549397u,761822839u,1598045760u,824983379u,1734892604u,824190781u,1010516060u,1566130754u,704708660u,1803188827u,1009788960u,488711474u,1399350374u,1464413980u,623128377u,1298164085u,1898709075u,912297615u,1566127667u,875836465u,1350930060u,2389596226u,808662595u,1349679219u,1864105984u,10803u,842216243u,1247482880u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,27u,858927409u,1129060864u,0u,0u,199178u,84413964u,203102233u,403900685u,50397699u,118097929u,242255686u,117440512u,5448u,1193803776u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,65536u,709777496u,1144590848u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,48u,506416980u,892608798u,505290014u,843925319u,1211510051u,437983781u,826490957u,1359478784u,8231u,640165927u,961156096u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,24u,724052518u,859510016u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,6523717u,83886080u,6970u,857473024u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,557597757u,741213952u,0u,65536u,0u,0u,768u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u,0u);

float image3Blit(in vec2 uv)
{
	uv = uv * vec2 (2.000, 4.000) - vec2 (0.500, 2.000);

	if (uv.x < 0.0 || uv.x > 1.0) return 0.0;
	if (uv.y < 0.0 || uv.y > 1.0) return 0.0;

	int vi = int ((1.0 - uv.y) * float (IMG3_HEIGHT));
	int ui = int (uv.x * float (IMG3_WIDTH));
	uint fetchedSample = shaderBuf3[vi*(IMG3_WIDTH/4) + (ui/4)];
	vec4 unpackedColor = unpackVec4 (fetchedSample);
	if (ui % 4 == 0) return unpackedColor.x;
	else if (ui % 4 == 1) return unpackedColor.y;
	else if (ui % 4 == 2) return unpackedColor.z;
	else return unpackedColor.a;
}
